column4: hello. i wanted to do a benchmark test on my ubuntu, what can i use?
what do you want to benchmark?
you already have it, just run it
what i want to do is a compare between linux and win
what do you want to compare exactly?
why use a synthetic benchmark? benchmark the actual apps you want to run
wow and wc3 run in wine and quake3 has a native client
do you think an average of 56 fps in glxgears is good enough for compiz?
well glxgears doesn't really tell you much, what video card do you have?
should be fine, best way to know is to try it out
any links for an easy install?
